name: Bors-NG
description: A merge bot for GitHub pull requests

MIX_ENV.description: Mode to run the application in

POOL_SIZE.description: Number of connections to PostgreSQL to keep open

PUBLIC_HOST.description: Where this website will be running (probably <app name>.herokuapp.com)

PUBLIC_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol to use when connecting to PUBLIC_HOST:PUBLIC_PORT

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of cookies

GITHUB_INTEGRATION_PEM.description: GitHub Integration private key (download the file, encode it with `openssl base64 -A -e < key.pem`, then paste the result here)

ZULIP_API_URL.description: API URL for the Zulip server to send crash notifications to, e.g. `https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/api/v1/`

ZULIP_BOT_EMAIL.description: Zulip bot email to send crash notifications with, e.g. `bot-name@leanprover.zulipchat.com`

ZULIP_BOT_API_KEY.description: API key for the Zulip bot

ZULIP_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Zulip channel to send crash notifications to

ZULIP_TOPIC.description: Zulip topic to send crash notifications to

ALLOW_PRIVATE_REPOS.description: Allow non-OSS GitHub repos to be added
